name: SectionGroup
description: Represents a OneNote section group. Section groups can contain sections and other section groups.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the section group.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Gets the name of the section group.

properties.name: notebook
properties.description: Gets the notebook that contains the section group.

properties.name: parentSectionGroup
properties.description: Gets the section group that contains the section group. Throws ItemNotFound if the section group is a direct child of the notebook.

properties.name: parentSectionGroupOrNull
properties.description: Gets the section group that contains the section group. Returns null if the section group is a direct child of the notebook.

properties.name: clientUrl{
properties.description: The client url of the section group. Read only

properties.name: sections
properties.description: The collection of sections in the section group. Read only

properties.name: sectionGroups
properties.description: The collection of section groups in the section group. Read only

methods.name: addSection
methods.description: Adds a new section to the end of the section group.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The name of the new section.

methods.name: addSectionGroup
methods.description: Adds a new section group to the end of this sectionGroup.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new section.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
